identified-content.org: Prudential Life Insurance Co of America

abstract.p: Prudential Life Insurance Co, in rare attempt by foreign company to increase its stake in South Korea's debt-ridden nonbank financial industry, plans to invest $500 million in CJ Investment Trust and Securities, unit of South Korea's largest food manufacturer, Cheil Jedang Corp (S)

block.p: In a rare attempt by a foreign company to increase its stake in South Korea's debt-ridden nonbank financial industry, Prudential Life Insurance Company plans to invest $500 million in a local investment trust company. Prudential signed a preliminary agreement with CJ Investment Trust and Securities, a unit of South Korea's largest food manufacturer, Cheil Jedang Corporation. The pact covers an initial investment of $100 million, with the balance to be invested over the next two or three years.

The pact covers an initial investment of $100 million, with the balance to be invested over the next two or three years.
